typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate_Cust as date,
		UpdatedDate_Cust as date,
		AddressID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate_Add as date,
		UpdatedDate_Add as date,
		Source as integer,
		UID as string,
		crDate as string,
		upDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> Customers
Customers select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		RecordStartDate = crDate,
		RecordEndDate = upDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimCustomers
DimCustomers derive(ActiveFlag = true()) ~> DimCustomer
